columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the permission set.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the permission set.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The date that the permission set was created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the permission set.

columns.name: instance_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SSO Instance under which the operation will be executed.

columns.name: relay_state
columns.description: Used to redirect users within the application during the federation authentication process.

columns.name: session_duration
columns.description: The length of time that the application user sessions are valid for in the ISO-8601 standard.
